name: MKMapSnapshotter.Options
desc: The options the snapshotter initializer uses to create a snapshotter to capture map-based imagery.

items.name: var region: MKCoordinateRegion
items.desc: The area of the map that you want to capture.

items.name: var mapRect: MKMapRect
items.desc: The map rect that you want to capture.

items.name: var camera: MKMapCamera
items.desc: The camera to use when taking the map snapshot.

items.name: var showsBuildings: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether the map displays extruded building information.

items.name: var pointOfInterestFilter: MKPointOfInterestFilter?
items.desc: The filter used to determine the points of interest shown in the snapshot.

items.name: var traitCollection: UITraitCollection
items.desc: Traits that determine the appearance of the map snapshot.

items.name: var size: CGSize
items.desc: The size of the image that you want to create.

items.name: var appearance: NSAppearance?
items.desc: The visual style (light or dark) to apply to the map when rendering the snapshot image.
